code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[prevScrollPos,setPrevScrollPos]=useState(0);const[visible,setVisible]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const currentScrollPos=window.pageYOffset;const visible=currentScrollPos<=0||prevScrollPos>currentScrollPos;setPrevScrollPos(currentScrollPos);setVisible(visible);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[prevScrollPos]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header ".concat(visible?'visible':'hidden'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/experience",children:"Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",children:"About"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:"button",children:"Contact"})," "]})]});};export default Header;
